page.title: 15Housing in Ingleton
page.content: The person we interviewed, Daisy Thistlethwaite, said she used to live at Greenwood Leghe which is now a caravan site by Moorgarth Garage owned by Mr Stocks who also owns the house.We asked Mrs Thistlethwaite that if she had a choice between any house in Ingleton which house she would choose.But she didn't want to move and didn't regret moving she says it's private and near the shops,but when she moved to Bank Hall she didn't move into a younger house as Bank Hall is ten years older than Greenwood Leghe.
